meanings.definition: A fixed amount paid by an insured individual for a covered service, as specified in an insurance policy.
meanings.sent1: The copayments for my doctor visits are always the same.
meanings.sent2: She had to make copayments for her prescription medications.
meanings.sent3: The copayments felt like little tolls on the road to good health.
meanings.sent4: His copayments were like small tokens of appreciation to the healthcare system.
meanings.sent5: Remembering to bring cash for copayments is crucial for medical appointments.

meanings.definition: The portion of a medical bill that a patient is required to pay out of pocket.
meanings.sent1: I budgeted for the copayments when planning for the hospital bill.
meanings.sent2: The copayments added up quickly for the surgery expenses.
meanings.sent3: Paying copayments felt like giving a high-five to the healthcare system.
meanings.sent4: Her copayments were like little reminders of the cost of staying healthy.
meanings.sent5: The copayments were like small coins jingling in the pocket of healthcare expenses.
